page.title: 17Farming In East Huntspill
page.content:
The farmer interviewed has 20 fields.The largest is eighteen acres.In some fields he grows potatoes but he is mostly concerned with animal farming.On his farm he has 130 cattle.The cows are used for producing milk.They give 250 gallons of milk a day .They are Friesian cows of which 15 are calves.The farmer uses bibby cake for feeding the cows in winter. On the farm there are 30 pigs.The name of the breed of pig is Large White.The pigs are used for pork. There are also 25 sheep on the farm.The farmer uses 4 tractors and 1 digger on and around the farm.
This data was collected by most members of Class 3, 1984-85.
